content.question: In the Vietnam Veterans Memorial, Maya Lin intended the monument’s form to represent

choices.label: a deep wound that will heal over time
the valor of the service members who sacrificed their lives
the desire of the United States for a victory over North Vietnam
the first letter of the English word “war”

content.answer: a deep wound that will heal over time

topic.text: 10.4: Theories and Interpretations of Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Explain how one or more art historically valid interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art) are derived from an analysis of its form, style, materials, content, function, context, reception, and/or meaning.
